@zou3519 Thank you for your reply. I am actually trying this method. But I don't know whether using torch.cat for padding will have the same speed performance as modification on the source code of the convolution.
@fmassa Thank you for help. I am trying to understand this code and do corresponding modification.

body:
@zou3519 Thank you for your reply. I am actually trying this method. But I don't know whether using `torch.cat` for padding will have the same speed performance as modification on the source code of the convolution. 
@fmassa Thank you for help. I am trying to understand this code and do corresponding modification.
